General.Name: Discount Investment Corp Ltd
General.Description: Discount Investment Corporation Ltd., a holding company, invests in companies in various sectors in Israel and internationally. The company provides mobile services, internet services, international call services, landline telephony services, roaming services, reciprocal connectivity, content and value added services, transmission services, and television over internet services. It also constructs, manages, and leases office, industry, and logistics, and commercial properties, as well as residential properties. In addition, the company sells agricultural products; packaging, exporting, and marketing of fruits, vegetables, and food products; offers refrigeration services; and supplies water for agricultural activities. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

2.Name: Mr. Haim  Taboch
2.Title: VP of Corp. Accounting and VP of Property & Building Accounting
